Entity.Description: This table stores rules for scheduling an order.
Entity.Name: Allocation_Rule

Attribute.Description: The primary key of the YFS_ALLOCATION_RULE table.
Attribute.Name: Allocation_Rule_Key

Attribute.Description: The unique identifier for the scheduling rule.
Attribute.Name: Allocation_Rule_Id

Attribute.Description: The description of the scheduling rule.
Attribute.Name: Description

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the complete order needs to be shipped.
Attribute.Name: Ship_Complete_Flag

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the complete line needs to be shipped.
Attribute.Name: Line_Ship_Complete_Flag

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the complete order needs to be shipped from a single ship node.
Attribute.Name: Ship_Single_Node_Flag

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the complete order line needs to be shipped from a single ship node.
Attribute.Name: Line_Ship_Single_Node_Flag

Attribute.Description: This field is being used by the deprecated allocateOrder API.
Attribute.Name: Hold_Allocation_Flag

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether a scheduling rule is active.
Attribute.Name: Activate_Flag

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the order needs to be cancelled in case of inventory shortage.
Attribute.Name: Cancel_Order_On_Excp_Flag

Attribute.Description: The number of hours that backordered lines need to wait before reattempting scheduling.
Attribute.Name: Back_Order_Wait_Period

Attribute.Description: The number of hours that order lines backordered from a node need to wait before reattempting scheduling.
Attribute.Name: Backorderfromnode_Wait_Period

Attribute.Description: The organization that is associated with this scheduling rule.
Attribute.Name: Organization_Code

Attribute.Description: The weightage given to the node over the distance for scheduling.
Attribute.Name: Weight_By_Distribution

Attribute.Description: The weightage given to the distance over the node for scheduling.
Attribute.Name: Weight_By_Geography

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether geographical data (latitude and longitude of ship nodes) needs to be used to optimize scheduling.
Attribute.Name: Use_Geography

Attribute.Description: The lead time to schedule, in days.
Attribute.Name: Schedule_Lead_Time

Attribute.Description: The number of days allowed for a shipment to be delayed.
Attribute.Name: Allowed_Shipment_Delay_Days

Attribute.Description: This field indicates what scheduling will first optimize on.
Attribute.Name: Optimization_Type

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the item uses shipment consolidation window. Default is N.
Attribute.Name: Use_Shp_Consol_Window

Attribute.Description: Indicates shipment consolidation window. This window will minimize number of final shipments, but may lead to higher cost.
Attribute.Name: Shp_Consol_Window

Attribute.Description: Whenever shipment/cost optimization is considered, this flag indicates whether procurement creation should be delayed to be consolidated with the inventory that is coming in the future.
Attribute.Name: Delay_Current_Procurements

Attribute.Description: Whenever shipment/cost optimization is considered, this flag indicates whether shipments of ONHAND inventory should be delayed to be consolidated with the inventory that is coming in the future.
Attribute.Name: Delay_Current_Shipment

Attribute.Description: The number of days to look for inventory availability beyond the requested date for scheduling service lines.
Attribute.Name: Service_Search_Window

Attribute.Description: The number of hours after which scheduling with try to process a product line again.
Attribute.Name: Retry_Sch_Time_For_Prod

Attribute.Description: The number of hours after which scheduling with try to process a service line again.
Attribute.Name: Retry_Sch_Time_For_Srvc

Attribute.Description: This field is not currently used.
Attribute.Name: Min_Time_Btw_Sch_And_Rls

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether inventory is assumed to be infinite beyond lead time.
Attribute.Name: Assume_Inf_Inv_After_Lead_Time

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates that on-hand safety factor should be applied in on-hand availability calculation when this scheduling rule is used. Default value: Y.
Attribute.Name: Apply_Onhand_Safety_Factor

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates that future safety factor should be applied in future availability calculation when this scheduling rule is used. Default value: Y.
Attribute.Name: Apply_Future_Safety_Factor

Attribute.Description: This flag will indicate if schedule can reserve the line if inventory is available but some constraints can't be fulfilled. Default value is: N.
Attribute.Name: Is_Res_Allwd_During_Sch

Attribute.Description: Indicates if fill quantity and ship complete should be ignored when scheduling is reserving. This flag is used only when IsReservationAllowedDuringScheduling is Y. Default: Y.
Attribute.Name: Rsrv_Ignore_Fill_Qty

Attribute.Description: For future functionality. Default: Y.
Attribute.Name: Rsrv_Ignore_Seq_Constr

Attribute.Description: Indicates if reservations of bundles is allowed without ratio. This flag is used only when IsReservationAllowedDuringScheduling is Y. Default: Y.
Attribute.Name: Rsrv_Kits_Out_Of_Ratio

Attribute.Description: Determines in what mode unplanned inventory will be used. In order for unplanned inventory to be used, item's configuration should also allow Unplanned Inventory. Not applicable for inventory API's.
Attribute.Name: Cons_Unplan_Inv_Mode

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the creation of this record.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the last modification of this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: The user who created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: The user who last modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: The program that created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: The program that modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the 'Minimize Number of Shipments to Customer' flag configured at the Transfer Rule should be ignored or not.
Attribute.Name: Ignore_Merging

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the 'Use Landed Cost' flag configured at the Enterprise Level should be ignored or not.
Attribute.Name: Ignore_Landed_Cost

Entity.Description: This table stores details on funds distributed between 2 charge transaction records.
Entity.Name: Charge_Tran_Dist

Attribute.Description: The primary key for the YFS_CHARGE_TRAN_DIST table.
Attribute.Name: Charge_Tran_Dist_Key

Attribute.Description: The order that is associated with this charge transaction distribution.
Attribute.Name: Order_Header_Key

Attribute.Description: The charge transaction that is associated with this charge transaction distribution. This is the charge transaction that distributed funds.
Attribute.Name: Distributed_From_Ct_Key

Attribute.Description: The charge transaction that is associated with this charge transaction distribution. This is the charge transaction that funds were distributed to.
Attribute.Name: Distributed_To_Ct_Key

Attribute.Description: The amount that was distributed to the charge transaction record, DistributedToChargeTranKey, from the charge transaction record, DistributedFromChargeTranKey.
Attribute.Name: Distributed_Amount

Attribute.Description: Timestamp when the record was created.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: Timestamp when the record was last modified.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: User who created the record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: User who modified the record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: Program that created the record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: Program that modified the record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Entity.Description: This table stores information about financial transactions associated with order processing. Every action carried out on an order which may have an impact on financial components is logged in this table.
Entity.Name: Charge_Transaction

Attribute.Description: The primary key for the YFS_CHARGE_TRANSACTION table.
Attribute.Name: Charge_Transaction_Key

Attribute.Description: The type of charge that is being applied to the order.
Attribute.Name: Charge_Type

Attribute.Description: The Order Header Key of the order that funds are being transferred from.
Attribute.Name: Transfer_From_Oh_Key

Attribute.Description: The Order Header Key of the order that funds are being transferred to.
Attribute.Name: Transfer_To_Oh_Key

Attribute.Description: This field indicates the status of this record.
Attribute.Name: Status

Attribute.Description: The amount that was actually charged or refunded to the buyer.
Attribute.Name: Credit_Amount

Attribute.Description: The amount that should be charged or refunded to the buyer.
Attribute.Name: Debit_Amount

Attribute.Description: The amount that could be charged to the buyer if the order was fulfilled. At the time of fulfillment, a negative entry is made in this column and positive entry in the DEBIT_AMOUNT column.
Attribute.Name: Book_Amount

Attribute.Description: The amount that is authorized for the order.
Attribute.Name: Open_Authorized_Amount

Attribute.Description: The amount that is requested for the charge or authorization of record of types "REQUEST_CHARGE" and "REQUEST_AUTHORIZATION". Once the request is processed, the actual amount will be shown as "CreditAmount" or "OpenAuthorizedAmount", for charge and authorization requests respectively.
Attribute.Name: Request_Amount

Attribute.Description: This field is used internally by the application to keep track of the amount which has been posted in the invoices as "collected".
Attribute.Name: Distributed_Amount

Attribute.Description: This field is used internally by the system to keep track of the amount which cannot be used at all due to the current payment processing rules.
Attribute.Name: Unusable_Amount

Attribute.Description: This field holds the amount for which a pre-settlement (settlement before invoice) is requested. Charge requests will be created for this amount.
Attribute.Name: Settled_Amount

Attribute.Description: For authorization requests, this field holds the identifier of the authorization that was made. For charge requests, this field holds the authroization ID to be used for charging the amount.
Attribute.Name: Authorization_Id

Attribute.Description: The date and time until which the authorization specified by the authorization ID is applicable.
Attribute.Name: Authorization_Expiration_Date

Attribute.Description: The key to the invoice that was created for this record, if applicable. Invoices are created for shipments, returns, or debit and credit memos.
Attribute.Name: Order_Invoice_Key

Attribute.Description: The order header that is associated with this charge transaction.
Attribute.Name: Order_Header_Key

Attribute.Description: The payment method that is associated with this charge transaction.
Attribute.Name: Payment_Key

Attribute.Description: The identifier of the order modification audit that caused this record.
Attribute.Name: Audit_Transaction_Id

Attribute.Description: The user exit call status of this record. The status will be "INVOKED" if the transaction fails during or after the user exit call, otherwise the value will be blank.
Attribute.Name: User_Exit_Status

Attribute.Description: The date and time when the charge request was processed.
Attribute.Name: Execution_Date

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates if the collection date is firm. If set to N, CHARGE requests awaiting consolidation will be settled as soon as possible - when the order's remaining book amount is 0 or when the CHARGE can fully consume the AUTHORIZATION. This flag will be set to Y by the Execution Collection API/Agent when the user exit indicates that the CHARGE should be retried later and specifies a collection date.
Attribute.Name: Is_Collection_Date_Firm

Attribute.Description: The date and time when the charge was realized.
Attribute.Name: Collection_Date

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the request was created for a precharge or a payment method whose payment type has the ChargeInsteadOfAuth flag turned on.
Attribute.Name: Hold_Against_Book

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates that the transaction represents an in person, or card in hand, transaction.
Attribute.Name: In_Person

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates that the Charge Transaction is either a Void request or submitted for a Void operation. Valid values for a Void Charge Transaction are V (is a void request), R (is a forced refund request), C (closed error record, already recreated) and null. Valid value for a Charge Transaction that has been requested for Void operation is S (void submitted for this transaction).
Attribute.Name: Void_Transaction

Attribute.Description: The total amount that does not require authorization or payment capture on the order.
Attribute.Name: Postponed_Amount

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates the transaction attempted to reach the payment gateway within a UserExit, but the UserExit was unable to contact the gateway. This may be updated to N by the user exit, and will be reset to null when the record moves to CLOSED status.
Attribute.Name: Offline_Status

Attribute.Description: This column indicates the transaction is valid for a call for authorization and whether or not the authorization code was acquired.
Attribute.Name: Call_For_Auth

Attribute.Description: The amount of cashback that has been charged using this transaction. Only valid for transactions of ChargeType CHARGE.
Attribute.Name: Cash_Back_Amount

Attribute.Description: Entry Type used to enter payment information into the system.
Attribute.Name: Payment_Entry_Type

Attribute.Description: For Asynchronous requests only, this field holds the identifier to the transaction closed as asynchronous. This identifier will be used for recording the actual response back in the system.
Attribute.Name: Async_Request_Identifier

Attribute.Description: Reference to AsyncRequestIdentifier, the actual transaction that was closed as async for which the response is now recorded in the system.
Attribute.Name: For_Async_Request_Identifier

Attribute.Description: Timestamp when the record was created.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: Timestamp when the record was last modified.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: User who created the record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: User who modified the record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: Program that created the record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: Program that modified the record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Entity.Description: Primary negotiation table. This table stores all order negotiations in the system. There can be zero or many negotations for an order.
Entity.Name: Negotiation_Hdr

Attribute.Description: Primary key. Always system generated.
Attribute.Name: Negotiation_Hdr_Key

Attribute.Description: Identifies what negotiation rule should be used to process this negotiation.
Attribute.Name: Negotiation_Rule_Key

Attribute.Description: This is base document type of negotiation. Currently, it can have value ORDER only.
Attribute.Name: Header_Entity

Attribute.Description: Primary key of the order for which this negotiation is created.
Attribute.Name: Header_Entity_Key

Attribute.Description: Enterprise of the order for which this negotiation is created.
Attribute.Name: Enterprise_Key

Attribute.Description: This is order's buyer's organization code.
Attribute.Name: Initiator_Org_Code

Attribute.Description: This is order's seller organization code.
Attribute.Name: Negotiator_Org_Code

Attribute.Description: Part of unique key of negotiation. Enterprise code and negotiation number together uniquely identify a negotiation.
Attribute.Name: Negotiation_No

Attribute.Description: Document type of the order for this negotiation is created.
Attribute.Name: Document_Type

Attribute.Description: Order number of the order for this negotiation is created.
Attribute.Name: Document_No

Attribute.Description: This is deprecated in version 5.0.
Attribute.Name: Release_No

Attribute.Description: This is request delivery date of the order. This is not used. Deprecated in version 5.0.
Attribute.Name: Delivery_Date

Attribute.Description: This is request ship date of the order. This is not used. Deprecated in version 5.0.
Attribute.Name: Ship_Date

Attribute.Description: This is terms_code of order. This can be configured as a negotiable attribute in yfs_negotiable_hdr_attr table.
Attribute.Name: Payment_Terms

Attribute.Description: This is FOB of order. This can be configured as a negotiable attribute in yfs_negotiable_hdr_attr table.
Attribute.Name: Freight_Terms

Attribute.Description: Pipeline this negotiation belongs to.
Attribute.Name: Pipeline_Key

Attribute.Description: Status of this negotiation.
Attribute.Name: Status

Attribute.Description: Flag to indicated if all negotiation on all header level terms is completed or not.
Attribute.Name: Header_Terms_Negotiated

Attribute.Description: Oraganization that has last responded to the negotiation. This will be either initiator_org_code or negotiator_org_code of the negotiation.
Attribute.Name: Last_Response_Org_Code

Attribute.Description: The action on the last response on the the negotiation. For example if last response on this negotiation was accept (1500) then this will have value 1500.
Attribute.Name: Last_Response_Action

Attribute.Description: Response number of the last response sent by initiator org.
Attribute.Name: Last_Initiator_Response_No

Attribute.Description: Response number of the last response sent by negotiator org.
Attribute.Name: Last_Negotiator_Response_No

Attribute.Description: Not used.
Attribute.Name: Application_Action

Attribute.Description: Not used.
Attribute.Name: Application_Reference

Attribute.Description: Date when negotiation status was changed last.
Attribute.Name: Status_Date

Attribute.Description: Date when negotiation expires. No logic is built on this. But, negotiation monitor can be configured to raise alerts on this.
Attribute.Name: Negotiation_Expiration_Date

Attribute.Description: Timestamp when the record was created.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: Timestamp when the record was last modified.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: User who created the record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: User who modified the record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: Program that created the record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: Program that modified the record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Attribute.Description: Virtual Field.
Attribute.Name: Enterprise_Code

Attribute.Description: Virtual Field.
Attribute.Name: Negotiation_Rule_Id

Entity.Description: This table stores line information of a negotiation. One negotiation line is created for each order line of the negotiation's order.
Entity.Name: Negotiation_Line

Attribute.Description: Primary key. A system generated number.
Attribute.Name: Negotiation_Line_Key

Attribute.Description: Primary key of the negotiation. Identifies negotiation this line is associated with.
Attribute.Name: Negotiation_Hdr_Key

Attribute.Description: Currently can have value ORDER_LINE only.
Attribute.Name: Line_Entity

Attribute.Description: Primary key of the order line to which this negotiation line corresponds too.
Attribute.Name: Line_Entity_Key

Attribute.Description: Prime_line_no of the order line to which this negotiation line corresponds to.
Attribute.Name: Prime_Line_No

Attribute.Description: Sub_line_no of the order line to which this negotiation line corresponds to.
Attribute.Name: Sub_Line_No

Attribute.Description: Not used.
Attribute.Name: Schedule_No

Attribute.Description: Not used.
Attribute.Name: Line_Group_Key

Attribute.Description: The unique identifier for Items of the order line to which this negotiation line corresponds to. This can be configured as a negotiable attributes in yfs_negotiation_line_attr table.
Attribute.Name: Item_Id

Attribute.Description: UOM of the order line to which this negotiation line corresponds to. This can be configured as a negotiable attributes in yfs_negotiation_line_attr table.
Attribute.Name: Uom

Attribute.Description: Product_class of the order line to which this negotiation line corresponds to. This can be configured as a negotiable attributes in yfs_negotiation_line_attr table.
Attribute.Name: Product_Class

Attribute.Description: Quantity on the order line. This is always negotiable.
Attribute.Name: Quantity

Attribute.Description: Price on the order line to which this negotiation line corresponds to. This can be configured as a negotiable attributes in yfs_negotiation_line_attr table.
Attribute.Name: Price

Attribute.Description: This is request delivery date of the order line. Depending on the order driver date, either delivery_date or ship_date is negotiable.
Attribute.Name: Delivery_Date

Attribute.Description: This is request ship date of the order line. Depending on the order driver date, either delivery_date or ship_date is negotiable.
Attribute.Name: Ship_Date

Attribute.Description: This is FOB on order line to which this negotiation line corresponds to. This can be configured as a negotiable attributes in yfs_negotiation_line_attr table.
Attribute.Name: Freight_Terms

Attribute.Description: Flag to identify if negotiation on all line level attributes for this line is completed or not.
Attribute.Name: Line_Terms_Negotiated

Attribute.Description: Oraganization that has last responded to the negotiation. This will be either initiator_org_code or negotiator_org_code of the negotiation.
Attribute.Name: Last_Response_Org_Code

Attribute.Description: The action on the last response on this negotiation line. For example if last response on this negotiation line was accept (1500) then this will have value 1500.
Attribute.Name: Last_Response_Action

Attribute.Description: Response number of the last response sent by initiator org on this negotiation line.
Attribute.Name: Last_Initiator_Response_No

Attribute.Description: Response number of the last response sent by negotiator org on this negotiation line.
Attribute.Name: Last_Negotiator_Response_No

Attribute.Description: Action to be performed on the order if negotiated quantity is less than the original quanitity. Currently, only CANCEL is supported.
Attribute.Name: Application_Action

Attribute.Description: Not used.
Attribute.Name: Application_Reference

Attribute.Description: Timestamp when the record was created.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: Timestamp when the record was last modified.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: User who created the record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: User who modified the record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: Program that created the record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: Program that modified the record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Entity.Description: Rule table for negotiation. This table stores a list of negotiable attributes are maintained in its children tables, yfs_negotiable_hdr_attr and yfs_negotiation_line_attr.
Entity.Name: Negotiation_Rule

Attribute.Description: Primary key. A system generated number.

Attribute.Description: The unique identifier or name for the rule.

Attribute.Description: Determines if negotiator can give counter offer for more quantity than the offered quantity.

Attribute.Description: Determines if negotiator or initiator can give multiple options in its offer.

Attribute.Description: Timestamp when the record was created.

Attribute.Description: Transit time for Monday.

Attribute.Description: Cut off time for Monday.
Attribute.Name: MondayCutOffTime

Attribute.Description: Cut off time for Tuesday.

Attribute.Description: This determines the UOM used for this transfer schedule. If null, then it is assumed to be DAY. Possible values: DAY, HR
Attribute.Name: Transit_UOM

Attribute.Description: User who created the record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: User who modified the record.

Entity.Description: This table stores order audit information.
Entity.Name: Order_Audit

Attribute.Description: The primary key for the YFS_ORDER_AUDIT table.
Attribute.Name: Order_Audit_Key

Attribute.Description: The order header that this order audit is associated with.
Attribute.Name: Order_Header_Key

Attribute.Description: The order line that this order audit is associated with.
Attribute.Name: Order_Line_Key

Attribute.Description: The order release that this order audit is associated with.
Attribute.Name: Order_Release_Key

Attribute.Description: The order release line that this order audit is associated with.
Attribute.Name: Order_Release_Line_Key

Attribute.Description: The type of modification that has occurred, for example AddQuantity or ChangeAppointment.
Attribute.Name: Modification_Type

Attribute.Description: Modification level of the order audit.
Attribute.Name: Modification_Level

Attribute.Description: Old values are stored as name-value pairs in this field. This field is used by deprecated APIs that log audits in non-XML format.
Attribute.Name: Old_Buffer

Attribute.Description: New values are stored as name-value pairs in this field. This field is used by deprecated APIs that log audits in non-XML format.
Attribute.Name: New_Buffer

Attribute.Description: This field provides additional reference information, and can be customized by the enterprise.

Attribute.Description: This field provides additional reference information, and can be customized by the enterprise.

Attribute.Description: This field provides additional reference information, and field can be customized by the enterprise.

Attribute.Description: This field provides additional reference information, and field can be customized by the enterprise.

Attribute.Description: The identifier of the audit transaction. All records for a modification are tied together using this ID.
Attribute.Name: Audit_Transaction_Id

Attribute.Description: Data Identification. For future use.

Attribute.Description: If the old buffer or new buffer cannot be stored within 1500 characters, they are split into multiple records. The SEQ_NO is incremented by 1 for each split record. All records for a given DATA_ID together provide the complete old buffer or new buffer.
Attribute.Name: Seq_No

Attribute.Description: The reason code of this order audit.

Attribute.Description: The reason text of this order audit.

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether or not this audit record is stored in XML format. Only deprecated APIs log audits in non-XML format.

Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Attribute.Description: The primary key of the YFS_ORDER_HEADER table.
Attribute.Name: Order_Header_Key

Attribute.Description: The primary key of the YFS_ORDER_LINE table.
Attribute.Name: Order_Line_Key

Attribute.Description: If post release, link to the order release.
Attribute.Name: Order_Release_Key

Attribute.Description: The unique identifier for a date type for which additional dates are stored.
Attribute.Name: Date_Type_Id

Attribute.Description: Requested Date.
Attribute.Name: Requested_Date

Attribute.Description: Expected Date.
Attribute.Name: Expected_Date

Attribute.Description: Actual Date.
Attribute.Name: Actual_Date

Attribute.Description: It is a data attribute to store committed dates from supplier.
Attribute.Name: Committed_Date

Entity.Description: This table stores all order documents in the system. These orders can be further classified into various types of documents. For example, ORDERS, PLANNED ORDERS and any other future types that the system may provide.
Entity.Name: Order_Header

Attribute.Description: The primary key for the YFS_ORDER_HEADER table.
Attribute.Name: Order_Header_Key

Attribute.Description: The enterprise that is associated with this order.
Attribute.Name: Enterprise_Key

Attribute.Description: The number of the order, which can be passed during order creation or generated based on a system rule setting.
Attribute.Name: Order_No

Attribute.Description: The sourcing classification that can be used during scheduling. This field can be matched with the corresponding field in the YFS_SOURCING_RULE_HDR table, and the appropriate sourcing rule can be selected.
Attribute.Name: Sourcing_Classification

Attribute.Description: The buyer organization that is associated with this order. This must be a valid organization defined in the system.
Attribute.Name: Buyer_Organization_Code

Attribute.Description: The seller organization that is associated with this order. This must be a valid organization defined in the system.
Attribute.Name: Seller_Organization_Code

Attribute.Description: The document type that is associated with this order. For example, Sales Order document (0001), Planned Order document (0002), Return Order document (0003) , and Purchase Order document (0005). This field determines the order's fulfillment cycle and controls the inventory and payment updates performed on the order.
Attribute.Name: Document_Type

Attribute.Description: The bill to address that is associated with this order.
Attribute.Name: Bill_To_Key

Attribute.Description: The identifier of the bill to customer. If a customer definition representing the buyer organization exists within the system, the BillToID can represent the CustomerID of the customer. Otherwise, the BillToID can represent the PersonID of the bill to address or the BuyerOrganizationCode of the buyer organization.
Attribute.Name: Bill_To_Id

Attribute.Description: The identifier of the customer's rewards number
Attribute.Name: Customer_Rewards_No

Attribute.Description: The seller's vendor identifier, as defined by the buyer.
Attribute.Name: Vendor_ID

Attribute.Description: The ship to address that is associated with this order.
Attribute.Name: Ship_To_Key

Attribute.Description: The identifier of the ship to customer. If a customer definition representing the buyer organization exists within the system, the ShipToID can represent the CustomerID of the customer. Otherwise, the ShipToID can represent the PersonID of the ship to address or the receiving node of the order.
Attribute.Name: Ship_To_Id

Attribute.Description: The ship node at which this order will be fulfilled.
Attribute.Name: Ship_Node

Attribute.Description: The node an order is to be shipped to.
Attribute.Name: Receiving_Node

Attribute.Description: Receiving node as identified by the buyer for eg:Store,DC Number.
Attribute.Name: Buyer_Receiving_Node_Id

Attribute.Description: The mark for address that is associated with this order.
Attribute.Name: Mark_For_Key

Attribute.Description: Mark For Node as identified by the buyer for eg: it could be a person,store,DC.
Attribute.Name: Buyer_Mark_For_Node_Id

Attribute.Description: The requested delivery date. This date is stamped on order lines (as requested delivery date) during order creation if no requested delivery date was passed at the order line level.
Attribute.Name: Req_Delivery_Date

Attribute.Description: The requested cancel date. If this date is in the future, the order will be scheduled only up to this date. If this date is in the past, the order can be scheduled for shipping today as long as it has not been cancelled already. The order line level cancel date overrides this attribute.
Attribute.Name: Req_Cancel_Date

Attribute.Description: The date the customer has requested the order to be shipped on. Based on the 'Driver Date' parameter of the document type, the ship date or delivery date will be calculated based on transit time calculations (if not passed at order creation).
Attribute.Name: Req_Ship_Date

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether this order is to be used as the default template. For this order to be used as a default template, the document type of the order being created should be configured to set the template document type as this orders document type.
Attribute.Name: Default_Template

Attribute.Description: The order classification attribute. This field can be used for reporting purposes. Sterling Selling And Fulfillment Suite system has no logic based on this field.
Attribute.Name: Division

Attribute.Description: The date on which the order was taken. If not passed during order creation, it is defaulted to current system date.
Attribute.Name: Order_Date

Attribute.Description: The order classification attribute. This field can be used for reporting purposes or to build conditions for modeling your business process. Sterling Selling And Fulfillment Suite system has no default logic based on this field.
Attribute.Name: Order_Type

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the order is yet to be confirmed. Order lines can only be deleted from the system in draft stage. This flag is not applicable for Quotes.
Attribute.Name: Draft_Order_Flag

Attribute.Description: This indicates what, if any, specific purpose this order was created for. The only valid value is 'EXCHANGE' which means the order is created for exchange purpose. But, the system may create an order with OrderPurpose of REFUND for internal use.
Attribute.Name: Order_Purpose

Attribute.Description: The return order header key for which this exchange order was created.
Attribute.Name: Return_Oh_Key_For_Exchange

Attribute.Description: This field indicates the exchange type of the order. The payment processing logic is dependent on this attribute.
Attribute.Name: Exchange_Type

Attribute.Description: The amount of funds available for the exchange order. This is the same as the total order amount of the return order.
Attribute.Name: Pending_Transfer_In

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the return was initiated by the gift recipient. This field is only used by return orders.
Attribute.Name: Return_By_Gift_Recipient

Attribute.Description: The identifier of the scheduling rule to be used while checking inventory availability. If not passed, the allocation rule with the ID 'SYSTEM' for the enterprise is used. If the allocation rule with the ID 'SYSTEM' is not found, the allocation rule with the ID 'SYSTEM' for the enterprise 'DEFAULT' is used.
Attribute.Name: Allocation_Rule_Id

Attribute.Description: The priority code of the order. External logic can be built for prioritizing orders.
Attribute.Name: Priority_Code

Attribute.Description: The numeric priority code as opposed to alphanumeric field PRIORITY_CODE.
Attribute.Name: Priority_Number

Attribute.Description: The contact address that is associated with this order.
Attribute.Name: Contact_Key

Attribute.Description: The carrier assigned to the order.
Attribute.Name: Scac

Attribute.Description: The carrier service code for this order.
Attribute.Name: Carrier_Service_Code

Attribute.Description: The account number of the customer with the carrier.
Attribute.Name: Custcarrier_Account_No

Attribute.Description: This field is not currently used.
Attribute.Name: Notify_After_Shipment_Flag

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the order was created by a node. This field is used during blind return creation at the nodes.
Attribute.Name: Created_At_Node

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the order has any derived children.
Attribute.Name: Has_Derived_Child

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the order has any derived parent.
Attribute.Name: Has_Derived_Parent

Attribute.Description: This field is not used within the application. It is published with events so that external decisions can be made based on it.
Attribute.Name: Notification_Type

Attribute.Description: This field provides details on notifications based on the notification type. For example, for notification type 'e-mail' this would be the e-mail address. This field is not used within the application.
Attribute.Name: Notification_Reference

Attribute.Description: The channel through which this order was created.
Attribute.Name: Entry_Type

Attribute.Description: The owner channel of the order.
Attribute.Name: Authorized_Client

Attribute.Description: The system or sales person who created the order.
Attribute.Name: Entered_By

Attribute.Description: The code that describes the personalization required for the order.
Attribute.Name: Personalize_Code

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the order or any order line is on hold. If the order is on hold, default configuration will stop the scheduling and release process for the order.
Attribute.Name: Hold_Flag

Attribute.Description: The reason code for putting the order on hold.
Attribute.Name: Hold_Reason_Code

Attribute.Description: The PO number of the customer. For purchase orders, this can be used for storing the purchase order number of the purchasing system if that number is not already stored as part of the order number.
Attribute.Name: Customer_Po_No

Attribute.Description: The PO number of the customer's customer. In some situations, this may need to be printed on the actual packaging.
Attribute.Name: Customer_Customer_Po_No

Attribute.Description: The name given to the order.
Attribute.Name: Order_Name

Attribute.Description: The payment rule that is associated with this order. All decisions on payment handling are controlled by this rule.
Attribute.Name: Payment_Rule_Id

Attribute.Description: The terms code of the order. This is passed on to the invoice and published with the invoice.
Attribute.Name: Terms_Code

Attribute.Description: The organization that pays the freight charges. For example, SUPPLIER, ENTERPRISE, and MARKETPLACE. However, you could pass any other value which is a valid shipment charge type as understood by the carrier by which the shipment is transported. See YFS_SHIPMENT_CONTAINER.carrier_payment_type for additional information.
Attribute.Name: Delivery_Code

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the actual freight charges should be passed on to the customer. If set to 'Y', invoicing picks up charges from shipments and uses that to invoice the customer.
Attribute.Name: Charge_Actual_Freight

Attribute.Description: The tax for the header charges.
Attribute.Name: Tax

Attribute.Description: The grand total for the order. Includes all line charges and taxes.
Attribute.Name: Total_Amount

Attribute.Description: The total amount at the time of the order creation. This field is not updated later in the cycle and can be used to track changes made since the order creation.
Attribute.Name: Original_Total_Amount

Attribute.Description: Total tax amount at the time of the order creation.This attribute only reflects the header tax.This field is not updated later in the cycle and can be used to track changes made since the order creation.
Attribute.Name: Original_Tax

Attribute.Description: The currency code in which this order is being processed. All price fields are assumed to be in this currency.
Attribute.Name: Currency

Attribute.Description: The Enterprise's default currency code.
Attribute.Name: Enterprise_Currency

Attribute.Description: The conversion rate from the order's original currency to the Enterprise's currency. This is not used internally within the system. This field is provided so that reports can be built in a standard currency for an Enterprise using SQLs.
Attribute.Name: Reporting_Conversion_Rate

Attribute.Description: The date which was used to determine the conversion rate.
Attribute.Name: Reporting_Conversion_Date

Attribute.Description: The information about the payment status of the order.
Attribute.Name: Payment_Status

Attribute.Description: The smallest expiration date of currently valid expirations. This field is used by the system payment processing agents. Any transaction having a financial implication will set this date to current system date. This field is used as a trigger by payment processing agents to create charge and authorization reqeusts.
Attribute.Name: Authorization_Expiration_Date

Attribute.Description: The date by which the quote has to be accepted by customer. This only applies to Quotes. The expiration date is computed by the expiration policy before presenting a quote to the customer. The expiration date is computed by adding EXPIRATION_PERIOD rule to the current date. The expiration date can also be updated before presenting to the customer. If the date is overridden, further computations of the date are ignored and the overridden expiration date is published on the quote for the customer.

See YFS_SHIPMENT_CONTAINER.carrier_payment_type for additional information.

Attribute.Name: Consmptn_Perc_Cost_Factor

System will treat the PROCESSING_BY_AGENT flag as N regardless of the actual value when current timestamp is after this timestamp. This can be used in the scenario when the Item Based Allocation agent does not complete its operation due to some failures and the PROCESSING_BY_AGENT flag does not get reset to N. Default Value: current timestamp.
Attribute.Name: Process_Over_By_Timestamp

Entity.Description: This tables stores an opportunity. An opportunity is a sales opportunity that a sales representative foresees and is used to keep track of multiple quotes that will be presented to a specific buyer. Any of these quotes can be negotiated upon but only one of these quotes can be accepted by the buyer, thereby permanently rejecting all other quotes. The opportunity will be closed once an order is created from the buyer selected quote.
Entity.Name: Opportunity

Attribute.Description: The primary key of the YFS_OPPORTUNITY table.
Attribute.Name: Opportunity_Key

Attribute.Description: The identification number of the opportunity, which can be passed during opportunity creation or generated based on a system rule setting or obtained directly from the user exit implementation. OpportunityID, DocumentType, EnterpriseCode are required attributes to uniquely identify an opportunity.
Attribute.Name: Opportunity_ID

Attribute.Description: The enterprise code. This field is a part of an opportunity's unique key. The EnterpriseCode, DocumentType and OpportunityID together uniquely identify an opportunity. Default value: DEFAULT
Attribute.Name: Enterprise_Code

Attribute.Description: The document type that is associated with this opportunity. For example, Opportunity document (0020). OpportunityID, DocumentType, EnterpriseCode are required attributes to uniquely identify an opportunity.
Attribute.Name: Document_Type

Attribute.Description: The buyer organization that is associated with this opportunity. This must be a valid organization defined in the system.
Attribute.Name: Buyer_Organization_Code

Attribute.Description: A custom name given to this opportunity to help identify the record uniquely.
Attribute.Name: Opportunity_Name

Attribute.Description: The detailed description of the opportunity.
Attribute.Name: Description

Attribute.Description: The identifier of the bill to customer. If a customer definition representing the buyer organization exists within the system, the BillToID can represent the CustomerID of the customer. Otherwise, the BillToID can represent the PersonID of the bill to address or the BuyerOrganizationCode of the buyer organization.
Attribute.Name: Bill_To_ID

Attribute.Description: The date that the opportunity was created.
Attribute.Name: Opportunity_Date

Attribute.Description: This field indicates the status of this opportunity.
Attribute.Name: Status

Attribute.Description: The user in which this opportunity is assigned to.
Attribute.Name: Owner_User_ID

Attribute.Description: The co-owner user is a user who jointly owns this opportunity with the orginal owner user.
Attribute.Name: Co_Owner_User_ID

Attribute.Description: This is the customer contact ID for the opportunity. This field maps to contact ID field of YFS_Customer_Contact.
Attribute.Name: Customer_Contact_ID

Attribute.Description: Indicates a team that can manage this opportunity. Default is Null.
Attribute.Name: Team_Code

Attribute.Description: The probability of success of the opportunity.
Attribute.Name: Probable_Success_Rate

Attribute.Description: The anticipated close date for the opportunity.
Attribute.Name: Expected_Close_Date

Attribute.Description: The currency value or budget of the opportunity.
Attribute.Name: Currency_Value

Attribute.Description: Pipeline this opportunity belongs to. The pipeline key is determined based on the input attribute passed and the pipeline conditions in the system configuration.
Attribute.Name: Pipeline_Key

Attribute.Description: The original lead to creation of this opportunity. E.g. Trade Shows, Call Center, Existing Customer.
Attribute.Name: Lead_Origin

Attribute.Description: If the opportunity is lost, this specifies the reason for losing this opportunity.
Attribute.Name: Lost_Reason_Code

Attribute.Description: The buyer's contact address.
Attribute.Name: Buyer_Contact_Address_Key

Attribute.Description: The primary quote for this opportunity.
Attribute.Name: Primary_Quote_Key

Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: The user who last modified this record.
